text:
Can #Algorithms fix the #COVID19 #vaccine rollout? Not without careful thinking. In @nytimes, @AmolNavathe and I propose 5 ways to use algorithms smartly to save lives during the rollout. Part of a great series ft. @Bob_Wachter @ashishkjha & others. -->
